column6: "FANTASTIC VOYAGE" pt. 3 (of 3) The Exiles' inter-dimensional detour with the FANTASTIC FOUR takes a turn for the worse ... and has devastating consequences for not one - but TWO Exiles! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
